experience-message1: I have experience in many IT areas, like networking, hardware, sales, etc, but I have been developing software for the past 5 years.

teamwork-message: I like teamwork. As a sociable person, I like to help others, and I don't hesitate to ask if something is not clear to me. I always advocate for a good atmosphere and collegiality.
experience-message-2: After many years of experience, during which I participated in several IT areas, I learned to see the bigger picture of facts and problems.
strength-message: I believe that my greatest strength is the desire to constantly learn new things and not to give up easily in the face of given problems.
projects-description1: The listed projects were done as part of regular schooling.
projects-description2: The functionality of the projects is presented in video recordings.
contact-intro: I currently have a job as a senior developer, but I am also open to private projects. You can contact me by this form:
